document.full_text: the eurovision song contest has become so popular around the globe that there may be scope one day for a worldvision song contest, executive supervisor jon ola sand told reuters.
document.title: eurovision head says global contest a "challenge"
lines_and_colors: the eurovision song contest has become so popular around the globe that there may be scope one day for a worldvision song contest, executive supervisor jon ola sand told reuters.
